questions.question: How many permanent members are there in the UN Security Council?
questions.explanation: The UN Security Council has 5 permanent members: China, France, Russia, UK, and USA.

questions.question: The European Union was established in 1993.
questions.explanation: The EU was formally established with the Maastricht Treaty in 1993.

questions.question: What is the capital of the European Union?
questions.explanation: Brussels, Belgium, is considered the de facto capital of the European Union.
